translations: 使非神秘化；使（某事）简单化（demystify 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: For more information, read the "Content authoring demystified" article cited in Resources.
sentences.translation: 要了解更多信息，阅读参考资源中的“Content authoring demystified”文章。

sentences.sentence: The "Content authoring demystified" article (see Resources) describes in detail how to author a new pattern.
sentences.translation: “Content authoring demystified”这篇文章(参见参考资源)详细地介绍了如何撰写新的模式。
